#summary Maven repository and usage instructions

= Repository =

{{{
<project>
	...
	<repositories>
		<repository>
		  <id>jnaerator</id>
		  <name>JNAerator Maven Repository</name>
		  <url>http://jnaerator.sourceforge.net/maven</url>
		</repository>
	</repositories>
	<pluginRepositories>
        	<pluginRepository>
			  <id>jnaerator</id>
			  <url>http://jnaerator.sourceforge.net/maven</url>
	        </pluginRepository>
	</pluginRepositories>
	...
</project>
}}}

= Usage = 

  * JNAnerator runtime classes, to support JNAerated sources :
{{{
<project>
	...
	<dependencies>
	   <dependency>
		<groupId>com.jnaerator</groupId>
		 <artifactId>jnaerator-runtime</artifactId>
		 <version>0.9.1</version>
		<scope>compile</scope>
	   </dependency>
	</dependencies>
	...
</project>
}}}

  * Maven JNAerator Plugin :
    # Put command line arguments in file `src/main/jnaerator/config.jnaerator`
    # Add the following lines to your `pom.xml` :
    {{{
<project>
	...
	<dependencies>
	   <dependency>
		<groupId>com.jnaerator</groupId>
		 <artifactId>jnaerator-runtime</artifactId>
		 <version>0.9.1</version>
		<scope>compile</scope>
	   </dependency>
	</dependencies>
	...
</project>
}}}
    #  Run with `mvn com.jnaerator:maven-jnaerator:jnaerate` : will create Java & Scala files in `target/generated-sources`
